pages.text: The FluxoMagnet is a tool that uses RF in order to pull nearby items into the player's inventory. Right clicking with it in hand will suck nearby items in. Press '$(k:cofh.mode_change_increment)' to toggle auto-attract mode, where items are nearby items are automatically pulled in. It can be charged and augmented in the Tinker's Workbench.

pages.title: FluxoMagnet
pages.text: It can be enchanted with $(l:thermal:world/holding)Holding$(/l) to improve RF capacity.
